_header: Mary you queen you mother maiden bright
Subjects: prayers, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, prayers to
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary — two couplets

BLHar2316.Transcription: Marie ȝow quen ȝow moder ȝow mayden brihtȜ wilt ȝow canst ȝow art of mihtȜow lyf ȝow loue ȝow hope of blisseIn sinne in sorwe in nede vs wisse
